Specimen Container(s): Kit with mini-tip flocked swab in sterile peel-pouch
Methodologies: Specimen preservation for culture and diagnostic assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Hardy Diagnostics Viral Transport Medium, a non-propagating culture-based medium for collection and transport of clinical specimens containing viruses.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical specimens for preservation of viral agents including Influenza A, Influenza B, Adenovirus, and Echovirus from the collection site to the testing laboratory.
